titles.title: King of my heart - (You are Good)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the King of my heart
be the mountain where I run
The Fountain I drink from
Oh He is my Song
Let the King of my heart
be the shadow where I hide
the randsom for my life
Oh He is my Song

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let the King of my heart
be the wind inside my sails
The anchor in the waves
Oh He is my Song
Let the King of my heart
the fire inside my veins
the echo of my days
Oh He is my Song

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: You're never gonna let me down

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: You're never gonna let me down

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
When the night is holding onto me
God is holding on.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
When the night is holding onto me
God is holding on.
